name: [enzyme]-S-sulfanylcysteine:tRNA-uridine sulfurtransferase (ATP-hydrolysing)
definition: tRNA uridine + [Enzyme]-S-sulfanylcysteine + ATP <=> tRNA containing 2-thiouridine + [Enzyme]-cysteine + AMP + Diphosphate
comment: multi-step reaction incomplete reaction (donor is unidentified in vivo, dithiothreitol[CPD:C00265] in vitro)
